text: On - Tvorets neba i zemli (sozdannykh bez predydushchego primera). Kak mozhet byt' u Nego rebonok, kak dumayut eti lyudi, yesli u Nego ne bylo suprugi? On - Tot, kto sozdal vso sushcheye, v tom chisle i tekh, kotorym poklonyayutsya eti lyudi naryadu s Allakhom. Allakh Vsevedushch i otmechayet, chto oni govoryat i chto delayut. On vozdast im za ikh slova i deyaniya
